title: The biggest tech acquisitions
description:
Microsoft, Facebook, Apple, Google or Amazon - these companies seem to be buying up half the world. But which of the 5 big tech giants does the most acquisitions?

Charter - ep. 1

This video on Nebula: https://nebula.app/videos/techaltar-which-tech-giant-does-the-biggest-acquisitions
